definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to be adjusted to uniformity (usually of weights and measures) (idiom)

sentences.english: With a tearful love lake, with love a happy circle.
sentences.chinese: 用淚水凝成愛的湖泊，用愛劃一道幸福的圈。

sentences.english: Their _(2)_ are timed to go together perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 他們的動作非常整齊劃一。

sentences.english: Now, instead of marching as one, we were ready to get loose.
sentences.chinese: 現在，沒有了整齊劃一的行進，隊伍開始變得鬆散了。

sentences.english: There will always be someone else who wants to scrape a key down the side of the shiny new 4 by 4.
sentences.chinese: 總是有人想用鑰匙在新買的鋥亮的四驅車上劃一道痕。

sentences.english: Make a 1cm deep slash in the center along the length of the dough.
sentences.chinese: 用刀片在麪包中間劃一長痕，約1釐米深。

sentences.english: Two hundred and ninety athletes did a broadcast gymnastics show which was neat and uniform.
sentences.chinese: 290名運動員表演的廣播體操整齊劃一。

sentences.english: They have the same groomed swing that they repeat time and time again.
sentences.chinese: 他們一遍一遍地重複著整齊劃一的揮杆方式。

sentences.english: A cat may look at a king.
sentences.chinese: 貓也可以審察國王，意爲大家劃一。

sentences.english: Handmade goods appeal to those who are tired of cookie -cutter products.
sentences.chinese: 手工製品受到那些已厭倦劃一產品的人的歡迎。

sentences.english: It can lead to tremendous disaster and risk.
sentences.chinese: 整齊劃一反而會帶來巨大的災難和風險。

definition: to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
